action.action-desc: Mr. Garbarino (for himself, Mrs. Harshbarger, and Mr. Suozzi) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to exempt certain drugs from the part D manufacturer discount program under the Medicare program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Ensuring Access to Essential Drugs Act.

section.header: Exempting certain drugs from the part D manufacturer discount program under the Medicare program
section.text: Section 1860D–14C(g)(2) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395w–114c(g)(2)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking and at the end;
in subparagraph (B), by striking the period and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

subparagraph.text: does not include an orally administered drug—

clause.text: for which a new drug application was approved under section 505 of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act; and
that has been granted a narrow exception permitting reclassification as a noninnovator multiple source drug under the Medicaid drug rebate program by the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services.
